features.name: Create API endpoint for arrival times
Implement Swipe Card for direction switching
Fetch and display stops on the map
Fetch and display arrival times on stop card
Fix bus stop asset image display
Switch to Victoria BC Transit GTFS data
Hide direction selector if only one direction exists for a stop
Filter arrivals by current day/calendar
features.description: Filter scheduled arrivals based on calendar.txt and calendar_dates.txt to match the current day of the week.

features.name: Display bus route number in Arrivals
features.description: Add the bus number (route short name) inside a square box next to the route name in the Arrivals list.

features.name: Use GTFS route colors
features.description: Style the route number box with the specific `route_color` and `route_text_color` from the GTFS data.

features.name: Scroll to next arrival
features.description: Automatically scroll the arrivals list to the next upcoming arrival based on the current Victoria, BC time.

features.name: Manual Date/Time Selection
features.description: Allow users to manually set the day of the week and time of day to view schedules, with a 'Current Time' reset option.

features.name: Incorporate realtime bus position, trip updates, and alerts
features.description: Show buses moving on map with bus number on logo, oriented in correct direction.

features.name: Configure Network for Mobile Access
features.description: Update API URL configuration to support LAN IP access for mobile devices and advise against using Tunnel mode due to Mixed Content restrictions.

features.name: Compact Date/Time Selector
features.description: Make the date/time selector smaller or use a popup menu to save space.

features.name: Green Square Stop Icons
features.description: Make stop icons bigger and change them to a green square style.

features.name: User Location Integration
features.description: Request user location, show it as a blue circle, and center the map on the user.

features.name: Improve Direction Naming & Scrolling
features.description: Rename Direction 0/1 to Inbound/Outbound. Fix arrival loading and auto-scrolling issues when switching directions.

features.name: Draggable/Collapsible Stop Card
features.description: Allow the user to drag the stop card down to a 'collapsed' state showing only the stop name, and drag up to expand.
